# Create Map of Mexico States
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
mexico_states <- st_read("mexican_states.geojson", quiet = TRUE) %>%
  

leaflet(Mexico_Albers) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.TonerLite) %>%
  addPolygons(highlightOptions = highlightOptions(fillColor = "yellow", 
                                                  fillOpacity = 1),
              label = ~admin_name, 
              weight = 1) 

  
```

## Projections
```{r}
Mexico_Albers <- "+proj=aea +lat_1=14.5 +lat_2=32.5 +lat_0=24 +lon_0=-105 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80 +datum=NAD83 +units=m +no_defs"
```
